overview: Kezban is a fellow living in the village. Her husband left her and her daughter and ran away. In the village, the young boy named Ali is interested in the Kezban and wants to marry him. They will be married anyway. Kezban is also a widow. So they do not hesitate to be together. They meet secretly and make love in the village straw. The daughter, who is quite old, is also aware of this relationship.
title: Ağa Düşen Kadın
